title: FS: T206 Dick Hoblitzell Pied 350 Raw (Reds) Reduced
author: peterose4hof

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Dick Hoblitzell Pied 350 Raw (Reds) Reduced
posts.post_content:
I have for sale a T206 Dick Hoblitzell with a Piedmont 350 back.  Price is $21 which includes shipping.  As you can see from the scans it is not in great condition, but a nice collectible nonetheless.

First pm takes it.  Paypal preferred but will accept m/o.
